actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the provisions relating to the payment of pension.

summary.text: Authorizes the continued payments of pension funds covering the aid and attendance cost for specified dependents of a veteran following the death of such dependent, on the condition that the income of the veteran does not exceed a specified limit. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the provisions relating to the payment of pension.
